eventId.description: The UUID unique identifier for a logical multi-part event

eventPartId.description: The UUID unique identifier for an event part. Parts are generated on browser, front-end, middle-tier, backend for a single logical event

applicationBuildVersion.description: Version of the application logging the event

applicationBuildDate.description: Build date of thie version of application logging the event in the EST timezone

eventName.description: Name of an event being logged

eventDate.description: Date of the occurance of this event in the EST timezone

eventTimestamp.description: Exact timestamp of the occurance of the event in the EST timezone

warehouseLocation.description: Coordinates of the warehouse with the product
